title: SS Beauty to Bank on Aggressive Omnichannel Model, to reach 25 Doors by Next Fiscal: Biju Kassim, President ... - Indian Retailer
summary: The Indian beauty and personal care market is experiencing significant growth, driven by both online and offline brands. Companies are focusing on innovation, expansion, and sustainability, with many brands achieving impressive revenue growth and customer base expansion. The market is also seeing an increasing focus on vegan and cruelty-free products, as well as a shift towards a more holistic approach to well-being.
product_or_process: Vegan and Cruelty-Free products and recyclable packaging
greenwashing: The article does not provide any evidence to suggest that any of the companies are engaging in greenwashing.
